oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jose Greco and his Company of Spanish Dancers, Singers, and Musicians at the Grand Ole Opry House

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Broadside advertising Jose Greco and his company of Spanish Dancers performing at the Grand Ole Opry. The ad features reviews of this show from the "N. Y. Journal-American" and "Life" Magazine.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides
Broadsides; Greco, Jose; Dance; Spain; Flamenco music; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jose Greco was a Flamenco dancer and choreographer who performed on stage and in movies from 1937 to 1995.
